link.synopsis: Relive the golden age of television with everyone's favorite funnyman, Uncle Milty! In 1953, Milton Berle debuted the Buick-Berle show, which mixed traditional variety show fare with sketch comedy. In the two episodes included here, he sings with Frank Sinatra, yuks it up with Tallulah Bankhead and pulls out all the stops in a duet of the Rodgers and Hart classic "Everything I've Got" with Martha Raye.
link.title: synopsis
The George Burns & Gracie Allen Show
Dean Martin & Jerry Lewis: Vol. 3: Still Laughing
Sid Caesar Collection: The Buried Treasures
The Best of Rowan & Martin's Laugh-In 2
The Carol Burnett Show: Show Stoppers
Saturday Night Live: Live from New York: The First 5 Years
The Carol Burnett Show: Let's Bump Up the Lights!
Judy, Frank and Dean: Once in a Lifetime
Dean Martin & Jerry Lewis: Vol. 2: When Television Was Funny
The Frank Sinatra Show: When You Are Smiling
The Man Behind the Badge: Vol. 1
Best of the Loretta Young Show: Season 1
The Adventures of the Scarlet Pimpernel: Vol. 2
The Jack Benny Show: Collector's Edition
The Golden Age of TV Comedy
The Rocky Jones Space Ranger Collection
The Very Best of the Honeymooners

link.synopsis: Identical twins are separated at birth: Prem (Salma Khan) is taken to America, where he becomes a singer, while his brother, Raja (also played by Kahn), is left in India to become a streetwise petty thief. But when Prem travels back to India to marry the beautiful Mala (Karishma Kapoor) and meets up with his long-lost brother, it's a comedy of errors. This charming film by Hindi director David Dhawan features musical direction by Anu Malik.
link.title: synopsis

link.synopsis: Kajol (Kajol) and Ajay (Ajay Devgan) are very much in love. But since Kajol is a middle-class girl and Ajay is a rich boy, Ajay's uncle is determined to break them up. He uses Kajol's platonic friendship with a middle-class boy named Raja (Aamir Khan) to convince Ajay that she's unfaithful. But if Ajay is to find happiness, he must resist his uncle's manipulations. Indra Kumar directs this romantic comedy with music by Anu Malik.
link.title: synopsis
Love Ke Liye Kuch Bhi Karega

link.synopsis: The Khan brothers' family venture is a delightful romantic comedy that moves with MTV-inspired slickness.  The always-interesting Kajol strikes up great chemistry with Khan.
link.title: synopsis
Love Ke Liye Kuch Bhi Karega

link.synopsis: A group of struggling New Yorkers wind their way through local watering holes on a chilly December evening, looking to make some sense of their own tangled lives. But what they end up finding is each other. This charming romantic comedy from independent film director Roger Hedden boasts an all-star ensemble cast, including Eric Stoltz, Campbell Scott, Katrin Cartlidge, Moira Kelly, Peter Riegert, Charles Durning and Daryl Hannah.
link.title: synopsis
I Love You, Don't Touch Me
One Day at a Time: Season 1
You Will Meet a Tall Dark Stranger

link.synopsis: "The Buick Berle Show" featured the top stars of 1950s film, music and theater. Volume 2 contains two episodes of the black-and-white variety show featuring colorful jokes blended with sketch comedy. The video includes spoof-skits "Dragnet" and "What's My Line?" Guests include TV host Dagmar, French singer-actress Denise Darcel, crooner Vic Damone, opera singer Marguerite Piazza, and actors Paul Douglas and Jackie Cooper.
link.title: synopsis
The Judy Garland Show: Featuring Ray Bolger and Vic Damone
The George Burns & Gracie Allen Show
Dean Martin & Jerry Lewis: Vol. 3: Still Laughing
Sid Caesar Collection: The Buried Treasures
The Best of Rowan & Martin's Laugh-In 2
The Carol Burnett Show: Show Stoppers
Saturday Night Live: Live from New York: The First 5 Years
The Carol Burnett Show: Let's Bump Up the Lights!
The Frank Sinatra Show: When You Are Smiling
Dean Martin & Jerry Lewis: Vol. 2: When Television Was Funny
The Man Behind the Badge: Vol. 1
Best of the Loretta Young Show: Season 1
The Adventures of the Scarlet Pimpernel: Vol. 2
The Jack Benny Show: Collector's Edition
The Golden Age of TV Comedy
The Rocky Jones Space Ranger Collection
The Very Best of the Honeymooners

link.synopsis: On the first day of a new job selling home-security systems, Tommy Hudler (David Arquette) makes a big sale -- and strikes up a romance with a single mother (Kate Capshaw). But Tommy's success takes a sinister turn when he learns his deceitful boss (Stanley Tucci) is staging fake break-ins on the homes he's supposed to protect, all in an effort to drum up business. Mary McCormack costars as Tommy's smitten co-worker in this engaging black comedy.
link.title: synopsis
Tennessee Ernie Ford: His Life and Times

link.synopsis: This action comedy marks the debut of a series of films about the Five Lucky Stars -- Teapot, Vaseline, Exhaust Pipe, Curly and Ranks -- a group of petty crooks who try to go straight by opening a cleaning company but always stumble into trouble. In Winners and Sinners, the quartet unwittingly runs afoul of a counterfeiting ring that's about to get busted by an overeager cop (Jackie Chan). Sammo Hung, who also plays Teapot, directs.
link.title: synopsis
Black Dragon Collection: Yao's Young Warriors
Half a Loaf of Kung Fu
The Real Bruce Lee 2 / Skinny Tiger & Fat Dragon / Top Fighter 2 / High Voltage
The Jet Li Collection: Evil Cult / Dr. Wai

link.synopsis: Loosely based on &NFi;The Prince and the Pauper&NFi_;, this winning comedy tells the story of Ballu (Arshad Warsi), a cabbie who continually fights with his father, and Rahul (Chandrachur Singh), a wealthy expatriate whose grandfather (Pran) has rejected India. When Rahul visits India and meets Ballu, the two decide to trade places. Soon they both fall in love, and Ballu finds himself trying to save Rahul's embattled company from a power-hungry manager.
link.title: synopsis
Love Ke Liye Kuch Bhi Karega

link.synopsis: There's good reason why Uncle Miltie's &NFi;other&NFi_; nickname is "Mr. Television": He was the first person to appear on TV (during an experimental broadcast from New York in 1928)!. A beloved entertainer -- and notorious joke stealer -- Berle was on the air for nearly three decades. Buick sponsored this two-hour special, which features appearances by Carol Channing, Peter Lawford and Maria Riva, plus the usual comedy sketches and songs.
link.title: synopsis
Sid Caesar Collection: The Buried Treasures
The Merv Griffin Show: 40 of the Most Interesting People of Our Time
The Loretta Young Show: Christina's Children Series
Groucho Marx: You Bet Your Life: The Lost Episodes
Edward R. Murrow: The Best of Person to Person
The Life of Riley / Our Miss Brooks
Best of the Loretta Young Show: Season 1
Martin & Lewis: Colgate Comedy Hour III & IV
The Best of the Abbott and Costello Comedy Hour
Abbott and Costello Funniest Routines: Vol. 2
The George Burns & Gracie Allen Show
Dean Martin & Jerry Lewis: Vol. 3: Still Laughing
The Best of Rowan & Martin's Laugh-In 2
The Carol Burnett Show: Show Stoppers
Saturday Night Live: Live from New York: The First 5 Years
The Carol Burnett Show: Let's Bump Up the Lights!
Dean Martin & Jerry Lewis: Vol. 2: When Television Was Funny
The Man Behind the Badge: Vol. 1

link.synopsis: A young, moral cop (Leo Koo) fighting rampant crime in Hong Kong is trying to live up to the reputation of his father, a former officer who lost his life in the line of duty. But the woman he loves (Charlie Young) is a prostitute -- and, to make matters worse, she's in love with a hit man named Killer (Alan Moo). This offbeat blend of action, comedy, crime and drama claimed the Hong Kong Film Critics Society Award for Best Screenplay.
link.title: synopsis
Crash Masters: The Dragon, the Hero

link.synopsis: Raja (Aamir Khan) has an opportunistic father, Hazari (Anupam Kher), who wants him to marry rich. So Hazari poses as a business tycoon, making it possible for Raja to marry the daughter (Madhuri Dixit) of a millionaire. There's just one problem: the young "lovers" can't stand each other -- and when they begin to develop true feelings, the charade is revealed. This award-winning comedy features the hit song "Aaj Na Chodenge" by Anand and Milind.
link.title: synopsis

link.synopsis: To meet the approval of his strict future in-laws, Kapoor's struggling artist moves in with them as a tenant. Popular 1970's director Mukherjee gives this light-hearted comedy a period aura.
link.title: synopsis

link.synopsis: This hilarious double bill features America's beloved comedy duo Stan Laurel and Oliver Hardy. In 1939's The Flying Deuces, Stan and Ollie join the Foreign Legion, get court marshaled, face a firing squad and make a bumbling aerial getaway. The pair's final film together, 1950's Utopia, finds the boys marooned on a desert island. When uranium is discovered, Stan and Ollie fight to protect their tiny paradise.
link.title: synopsis
Laurel & Hardy: Air Raid Wardens / Nothing But Trouble
The Laurel & Hardy Collection: Vol. 2: Alone and Together
Laurel & Hardy: March of the Wooden Soldiers
W.C. Fields Comedy Collection: The Bank Dick
The Harold Lloyd Comedy Collection: Vol. 2
The Best of Abbott and Costello: Vol. 3
Keep 'Em Flying / Ride 'Em Cowboy / Pardon My Sarong / Who Done It?
The Best of Abbott and Costello: Vol. 4
Laurel & Hardy: Be Big / A Lucky Dog
Laurel & Hardy: This Is Your Life / Laurel & Hardy at the Movies
Martin & Lewis: At War with the Army
W.C. Fields Comedy Collection: International House
The Three Stooges: All the World's a Stooge
Slapstick Symposium: The Charley Chase Collection 2
Slapstick Symposium: The Stan Laurel Collection: Vol. 2

link.synopsis: When the one-hit-wonder Suburbans -- a 1980s New Wave group -- reunite for the wedding of a former member (Will Ferrell), they get the surprise of their lives when a record company executive (Jennifer Love Hewitt) offers them a chance at a comeback. But claiming 15 minutes of fame is harder the second time around in this charming comedy also starring Craig Bierko, Amy Brenneman, Ben Stiller and Antonio Fargas.
link.title: synopsis
Confessions of a Sociopathic Social Climber
Anchorman: The Legend of Ron Burgundy
The Mostly Unfabulous Social Life of Ethan Green
South Park: Bigger, Longer and Uncut
The Brady Bunch in the White House
Late Night with Conan O'Brien 10th Anniversary Special

link.synopsis: Based on true events, this is the final film in a Hong Kong action-thriller trilogy. Inspector Hung (Anthony Wong) is on assignment in China with his new partner, Wu Xing-Guo. Together, they must capture a criminal who's committed crimes in both countries. Differences between the two officers, however, disrupt the men's mission as political and personal tensions rise. Director Kirk Wong offers a violent, intelligent thriller that mixes comedy with combat.
link.title: synopsis
Strike Commando / Mannigan's Force / Death Raiders / Operation Nam
Shadow Hunters II: Echo of Destiny
Water Margin: True Colors of Heroes

link.synopsis: After mob kingpin Don is killed by police, officer D'Silva (Iftekhar) meets Vijay (Amitabh Bachchan) -- a dead ringer for the dead gangster -- and asks him to impersonate the villain so the cops can infiltrate the rest of his underworld gang. Our look-alike hero is reluctant at first, but when D'Silva offers to educate Vijay's young wards, it's an offer he can't refuse. The Bollywood action comedy features the hit song "Khaike Paan Banaraswala."
link.title: synopsis
Jis Desh Men Ganga Behti Hai

link.synopsis: The team of Govinda and Karishma Kapoor are paired once again in director David Dhawan's musical comedy. The duo portrays paramours on a European adventure who return to Mumbai and must struggle to unite their feuding families and convince them to accept the couple's union. Mishaps, masquerades and misunderstandings ensue in this box-office hit, which is sprinkled with plenty of high jinks and song.
link.title: synopsis
Kyo Kii... Main Jhuth Nahin Bolta

link.synopsis: Two young men -- Prem (Salman Khan) and Amar (Aamir Khan) -- are broke and have no concrete plans for the future when they discover that a stunning heiress (Raveena Tandon) lives nearby. Both Prem and Amar make it their mission to charm the young lady into marriage. But they're not the only ones vying for her wealth. Rajkumar Santoshi directs this lighthearted blend of fun comedy, romance and action.
link.title: synopsis
Kyo Kii... Main Jhuth Nahin Bolta
Love Ke Liye Kuch Bhi Karega

link.synopsis: Chandni (Urmila Matondkar) is a nightclub dancer who hopes the man of her dreams will someday come along and whisk her away to a more respectable life -- but what she gets instead is rich, seedy playboy (Salman Khan). After they marry, Chandni's dreams of a happy ending seem destined to fade, yet everything changes when she wins the hearts of her husband's wealthy family. Andaleb Sultanpuri directs this quirky comedy with music from Anu Malik.
link.title: synopsis

link.synopsis: Michael and Angelo Misery (Leo Rossi and Lorenzo Doumani) stand to inherit their gangster father's $200 million estate, but there are a couple of catches: First, the boys must stay out of trouble for a year, and second, they must get married. For the goofy Misery brothers, both feats prove easier said than done. The all-star cast of this raucous comedy includes Abe Vigoda, Lou Ferrigno and Erik Estrada.
link.title: synopsis
Sleeping Beauty: Classic Motion Picture with the Kirov Ballet
Ron White: They Call Me "Tater Salad"
Platinum Comedy Series: The Torry Brothers: A Family Affair

link.synopsis: A laugh-riot from first joke to final bow, this collection of highlights showcases America's edgiest funnyman, distilling some of Chris Rock's best material from his HBO comedy series. Raw and unrepentant, Rock riffs on everything. Bits include a mock public service announcement for a "Guns for Knives" trade-in program and the infamous "Taxi Driver Confessions," in which Rock hilariously puts on his passengers.
link.title: synopsis
Best of the Chris Rock Show: Vol. 2
Saturday Night Live: The Best of Chris Rock
Jamie Foxx Unleashed: Lost, Stolen and Leaked!
Lewis Black: Red, White and Screwed
Late Night with Conan O'Brien 10th Anniversary Special
Saturday Night Live: The Best of Will Ferrell: Vol. 1
I Think I Love My Wife
The Oprah Winfrey Show: 20th Anniversary Collection
Knowing Me Knowing You with Alan Partridge: The Complete Series
The Second City: The First Family of Comedy
A Bit of Fry and Laurie
Mystery Science Theater 3000: Hercules Against the Moon Men

title.regular: Best of the Chris Rock Show: Vol. 1
title.short: Best of the Chris Rock Show: Vol. 1

link.synopsis: Struggling caterer Dylan (David Spade) has fallen for his gorgeous new neighbor, the cello-playing Lila Dubois (Sophie Marceau). The only problem is, she doesn't know he exists. Determined to get her attention, Dylan comes up with plan to rescue her beloved dog -- but first, he'll have to plan the "dognapping." Jeff Pollack directs this raucous comedy co-starring Artie Lange, Martin Sheen, Patrick Bruel and Jon Lovitz.
link.title: synopsis
The Cave of the Yellow Dog

link.synopsis: Apparao (Rajendra Prasad) is a habitual money-borrower who's buried in unimaginable debt. In a desperate ploy for cash, he marries a well-to-do woman on her deathbed (Sobhana) -- but she's a lot further from eternal rest than Apparao had anticipated. He seeks a divorce, but his wife will only grant him his freedom if he can marry off her crazy sisters. E.V.V. Satyanarayana directs this wacky Telugu comedy with songs from Rajan and Nagendra.
link.title: synopsis

link.synopsis: This wacky comedy tells the story of Nathan and Philbert Nutt (both played by Stephen Kearney), twins separated at birth. All grown up now, Nathan -- who pops in and out of multiple personalities -- escapes from a mental institution and winds up at Philbert's mansion. Confusion ensues when Nathan is mistaken for his ambitious politician brother by both Philbert's wife, Diane (Amy Yasbeck), and his mistress, Miss Tress (Traci Lords).
link.title: synopsis
The 2006 Academy Award Short Films Collection
HDNet Fights: Fedor Returns: "Yarennoka" from Japan
A Newsreel History of the Third Reich: Vol. 15
The Best of Boys in Love
He Died with a Felafel in His Hand
City Slickers II: The Legend of Curly's Gold
The Man Who Knew Too Little

link.synopsis: Hoping for a little R&R and fun in the sun, all-American college football star Day-run Southboy (Daron Fordham) goes coastal, only to find himself pursued by sports agents, gold diggers -- and a bevy of babes in the barest of bikinis. Co-starring rapper Kenny Flyy and featuring music by Trapp, 2 Live Crew, Master P and the Jackson Five, this party-hearty comedy was filmed on location in Daytona Beach, Fla., during the 1997 Black Spring Break.
link.title: synopsis
Wu Tang: Kung Fu Vampire / Hidden Darts
From Justin to Kelly: The Tale of Two American Idols

link.synopsis: Unrequited love takes a funny turn when Ajay (Aamir Khan), a nerdy modeling agency photographer, falls for for Anita (Madhuri Dixit), a beautiful co-worker. He's so sure that she loves him too that he makes marriage plans, unaware that Anita's in love with Vikram (Jainendra). She has to figure out how to quell Ajay's obsession -- fast! Khushboo and Satyendra Kapoor Satyen Kappu co-star in this light Bollywood comedy.
link.title: synopsis

link.synopsis: Prem (Salman Khan) and Puja (Karisma Kapoor), the wealthy husband-and-wife owners of a large modeling agency, find their marriage in trouble when the beautiful Rupali (Sushmita Sen) arrives on the scene. When Prem and Rupali run away on a Swiss vacation, they run into Prem's best friends, who urge them to end the affair. Meanwhile, when Puja leans of the pair's deception, she goes all out to win her husband back in true screwball comedy fashion.
link.title: synopsis

link.synopsis: Mistaken identity leads to laughs in this comedy starring Govinda as a hotel waiter named Raja who sets out to find a rich woman to marry. Sapna (Raveena Tandon) catches his eye, but she believes Raja is Rahul Saxena (also Govinda), a suave playboy and Raja's spitting image. When the error is revealed, she conspires with Raja and a friend to kidnap the real Rahul and send Raja to take his place. Simran and Arunai Irani co-star.
link.title: synopsis
Kyo Kii... Main Jhuth Nahin Bolta

link.synopsis: Monk Ru-Dee (Rudy Ray Moore) of the Dolemite Clan is on a mission into darkest China to find the deadly Westside Monk Tupac (Eugene Thomas) and bring him to justice. First, however, he'll have to deal with a host of lethal ninja gangs and one topless Ninja Ho. Under the tutelage of wise Abbot White (Robert Tai) and with the help of the Clan of the Wu Tang, one tough brother will fight for what's right in this hilarious blaxploitation comedy.
link.title: synopsis
Rudy Ray Moore: Live at Wetlands: N.Y.C.
Vintage Movie Classics: One Man Army
Jo Jo Dancer, Your Life is Calling
Citizen Toxie: The Toxic Avenger IV
Trailer Park Boys: Countdown to Liquor Day

link.synopsis: Explosive young comedian Miles "Foolish" Waise (Eddie Griffin) plans to make it big -- but not if it means selling out. He'd rather work with his fast-talking brother, "Fifty Dollah" (played by rap superstar Master P), who secretly dreams of opening a comedy club. But before the siblings can become business partners, they must settle a score with ruthless neighborhood drug lord El Dorado Ron (Andrew Dice Clay).
link.title: synopsis
Platinum Comedy Series: Tracy Morgan: Life, Love & Lust
Diary of a Mad Black Woman: The Play
Al Di Meola: Speak a Volcano: Return to Electric Guitar
UFC: The Ultimate 100 Greatest Fights: Vol. 1
Tyler Perry's Madea Goes to Jail

link.synopsis: Writer-director Roberto Benigni stars as Loris, a wallflower with an overactive libido, in this Italian comedy of errors. At a party, Loris approaches a woman (Nicoletta Braschi) whom he thinks is "easy" -- only to learn that she's a cop. The cop files a report that leads her boss to think that Loris is the crazed sex killer he's been hunting for more than a decade. Soon, the police begin spying on Loris, and the policewoman goes undercover as bait.
link.title: synopsis

link.synopsis: Pai-san (Feng Ku) and Wu Long (Kwok Choi Hon) are con men mistaken for kung fu experts hired to protect a small town from a horde of baddies. But not only do the townsfolk think the bumbling men are an unstoppable force; the bad guys do, too. As the villains send for reinforcements for the big showdown, the two unlucky heroes must prepare for the fight of their miserable lives in this action-packed kung fu comedy.
link.title: synopsis
Shaw Martial Arts Legends: Shaolin Quick Draw / White Lotus Trio
Wu Tang: Fatal Flying Guillotine / Hell's Wind Staff
Big Box of Kung Fu: Return of the Chinese Boxer
Revenge of the Kung Fu Master
Killer of Snake, Fox of Shaolin
Lois & Clark: The New Adventures of Superman
Sword Masters: Two Champions of Shaolin
Deadly Snail vs. Kung Fu Killer
The Chinese Godfather / Duel of Karate

link.synopsis: While posing as nightclub hostesses to catch a dangerous killer, Hong Kong cops Li Min-Feng (Moon Lee) and Grace discover a mafia-run drug smuggling operation. To bring these gangsters to justice, the pair must first face off against the mob boss's Japanese hit woman (Yukari Oshima). An entertaining blend of action and comedy, this Hong Kong movie co-stars Melvin Wong, Sophia Crawford, Fat Chung and Billy Chow.
link.title: synopsis
The Real Bruce Lee 2 / Skinny Tiger & Fat Dragon / Top Fighter 2 / High Voltage
Once Upon a Time in America

link.synopsis: This collection showcases the Little Tramp at his best, but is by no means comprehensive. Three short films -- The Immigrant, The Rink and The Vagabond -- cover Charlie Chaplin's finest work with Mutual Studios and illustrate his early genius. The full-length movie Tillie's Punctured Romance, credited as cinema's first feature comedy, was Chaplin's last film solely as an actor before his leap to the director's chair.
link.title: synopsis
The Little Tramp: The Charlie Chaplin Collection
The Harold Lloyd Comedy Collection: Vol. 3
The Harold Lloyd Comedy Collection: Vol. 2
Old Wives for New / The Whispering Chorus
With Sitting Bull at the Spirit Lake Massacre

link.synopsis: A taxi driver (Chow Yun-Fat) hits the beguiling May (Joey Wong) with his cab and thinks he's the cause of her preexisting permanent limp in this comedy of errors. Unaware that the accident didn't cause May's limp, Joe valiantly offers to help her family open a grocery store. Things heat up when May's competitive uncle opens a store nearby, Joe begins to fall for May, May's cousin Scarlet falls for Joe, and Joe's brother falls for Scarlet.
link.title: synopsis
Who's the Woman, Who's the Man

link.synopsis: A holiday ski trip turns into a weekend of screaming matches and bed-hopping when a father (David Rasche) looking to mend fences invites his estranged son (George Newbern) -- who's joined by five of his yuppie friends -- to Utah for Christmas. Stephen Baldwin, Alison Eastwood, Claudia Schiffer and Robert Downey Jr. are among the eclectic cast of characters in this quirky sex comedy from director George Haas.
link.title: synopsis
A Guide to Recognizing Your Saints
The Boys and Girls Guide to Getting Down

link.synopsis: Before he became Austin Powers, Mike Myers showcased many memorable characters during his years on the long-running sketch comedy program "Saturday Night Live," including wannabe rocker Wayne Campbell and Simon, a young boy who likes to draw. Myers embraces his feminine side as Linda Richman, the lively host of "Coffee Talk" and No. 1 Barbra Streisand fan, and also portrays Dieter, the outlandish host of German art-house talk show "Sprockets."
link.title: synopsis
Saturday Night Live: The Best of David Spade
Saturday Night Live: The Best of Eddie Murphy
Saturday Night Live: The Best of Phil Hartman

title.short: SNL: The Best of Mike Myers

link.synopsis: When the prince of the Forbidden City dies, the high priest is left without a figurehead to control and thus no power of his own in this kung fu comedy flick from director Yuen Wo-ping. To remedy this situation, the high priest decides to create a &NFi;new&NFi_; emperor who he can control. Soon, however, this emperor figures out what the high priest is up to and attempts to take matters into his own hands.
link.title: synopsis
Wu Tang: Fatal Flying Guillotine / Hell's Wind Staff
Dynamo / Death Beach /The Close Encounters of Vampire / From China with Death
Super Kung Fu: Way of the Fox / Ninja Killer

Crash Masters: Secret Life of the Ninja
Brooklyn Zu Collection: Goose Boxer, Tiger Over Wall, Tiger's Claw
Half a Loaf of Kung Fu

link.synopsis: Although celebrated among Hong Kong cinema fans for its action-packed finale, this Joe Cheung film is primarily a buddy comedy about two cops, Shin Chin-Chian (Jacky Cheung) and Chiang Li-Chi (Stephen Tung). The pair's investigation of some murderous underworld figures is hampered by a visit from Shin's mainland cousins and Chiang's encounter with an ex-girlfriend (Bonnie Fu) who's witnessed a mob hit.
link.title: synopsis
The Real Bruce Lee 2 / Skinny Tiger & Fat Dragon / Top Fighter 2 / High Voltage
RiffTrax: The Best of RiffTrax Shorts: Vol. 1
Once Upon a Time in China 2
Half a Loaf of Kung Fu

link.synopsis: When an army of robots shaped like gargantuan chess pieces invades, four female warriors dressed like playing cards unite to defend their homeland. Led by the stern Sunday Spades, the quartet is rounded out by combat expert Casa Clubs, the superspeedy Jo Diamonds and the seductive psychic Coco Hearts. Featuring both English and Japanese tracks, this little-known anime feature combines elements of both comedy and science fiction.
link.title: synopsis
Burn Up Excess: Vol. 2: Crimes and Missed Demeanors
Legend of Himiko #3: Sword of Seven Blades
Tenchi the Movie 2: The Daughter of Darkness
Dragon Ball Z: The World's Strongest
InuYasha: The Movie: Affections Touching Across Time
InuYasha: The Movie 3: Swords of an Honorable Ruler
Dragon Ball Z: The Dead Zone
Fullmetal Alchemist: The Movie: Conqueror of Shamballa

link.synopsis: When Adam (Zach Galligan) proposes to Carrie (Laurel Holloman) just two weeks into their relationship, his friends decide they need to intervene in this romantic comedy. The concerned bachelor buddies plan an all-boys camping trip to convince the impulsive would-be groom not to marry his new love. The scheme backfires, however, when Adam shows up with Carrie, and she shows his buddies that she can play their game, too.
link.title: synopsis
The Incredibly True Adventure of 2 Girls in Love

link.synopsis: Kajal (Divya Bharati) has a crush on a wealthy singer named Ravi (Rishi Kapoor) in this rousing romantic comedy. The two meet, fall in love and eventually marry, but evil family members attempt to kill both the young couple and the groom's mother! The trio constructs an elaborate ruse to ward off the family, but Ravi must go underground in order to save their lives. Will he find Kajal waiting when he reappears?
link.title: synopsis
Kal Ho Naa Ho: Tomorrow May Never Come

link.synopsis: A team of bumbling bank robbers -- Rock (Gary Beadle), Sal (John Bushnell), Space (Saltz) and Nach (Pancho Russell) -- is offered a huge job by a gangster boss. They just need a driver, and that's where things go wrong. They decide to hire drifter Kevin (David Doyle), who seems the perfect man for the plan except for one small hitch: He doesn't know how to drive. High jinks ensue in this quirky British comedy from Troma Entertainment.
link.title: synopsis
The Three Stooges: Meet the Baron / Gold Raiders
Killer Flood: The Day the Dam Broke
Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels

link.synopsis: After yet another ghastly, near-fatal crash, bumbling stuntman Super Dave Osborne (Bob Einstein) discovers that his manager has run off with all of his money. He's about to give up on showbiz forever when he meets clumsy single mom Sandy (Gia Carides) and her ailing son. Now, Dave's determined to raise money to help his new friends -- even if it kills him -- in this klutzy comedy co-starring Dan Hedaya.
link.title: synopsis
Bob Ross: The Joy of Painting: 3-Hour Workshop
Steve Vai: Live at the Astoria
My Sister Eileen / She Wouldn't Say Yes
The Best of Rowan & Martin's Laugh-In 2
Major League 3: Back to the Minors
What's the Worst That Could Happen?

title.regular: The Extreme Adventures of Super Dave
title.short: The Extreme Adventures of Super Dave

link.synopsis: While playing in their apartment building's attic, Brad (Clayton Taylor) and Frankie (Steven Losak) find a suitcase stuffed with cash. Instead of reporting their discovery to the cops, the boys give the loot to their indigent neighbors, including one whose daughter needs a lifesaving operation. It seems, however, that the greenbacks came from a bank heist -- and the thieves will stop at nothing to recoup their ill-gotten gains this family comedy.
link.title: synopsis
Tommy Tricker and the Stamp Traveller
The Neverending Story 3: Escape From Fantasia
Wallace & Gromit: The Curse of the Were-Rabbit

link.synopsis: Stan (Rémy Girard) runs the blue-collar tavern Chez Stan; he also coaches a hopeless amateur hockey team of his beer-drinking buddies called Les Boys. When Stan finds himself up to his kneecaps in debt to mobster Méo (Pierre Lebeau), he makes a deal. If Les Boys can win a match against Méo's team of thugs, the debt will be forgiven. Now, Stan must lead his troubled team in the game of their lives in this underdog comedy.
link.title: synopsis
Major League 3: Back to the Minors

link.synopsis: A wild night on the town provides the antidote for marital misery in this hilarious comedy. Having just been left by his wife, Dan (Emilio Estevez) is now hitting the Los Angeles clubs in an effort to find himself. He meets up with his fast-talking friend, Jeff (Steven Weber), who's determined to show Dan a good time -- whatever the cost. At the end of the night, Dan encounters a police shrink who may just have the answers to his problems.
link.title: synopsis
The Minor Accomplishments of Jackie Woodman: Season 1
The Triple B Collection: Savage Beach
How to Kill Your Neighbor's Dog

link.synopsis: In this Bollywood entertainment, Sha Rukh Khan plays a private dick who stumbles on an international conspiracy when he's assigned to track down a kidnapped child. Romance, comedy, action, musical numbers and mystery mingle as the gumshoe follows the clues and still finds time to woo the ladies. This Hindi film may not hold the attention of younger Indian cinema aficionados, but fans of the classics fall for Shah Rukh's cool character.
link.title: synopsis
Kal Ho Naa Ho: Tomorrow May Never Come

link.synopsis: Host John Larroquette takes viewers on a nostalgic trip through the 1965-1968 sci-fi comedy series. The disc's rare footage includes Guy Williams's screen test, extended clips from the 1965 pilot, bloopers and the original CBS network sales presentation. Viewers also get to go behind the scenes of the 1998 big-screen version. To top it off, Billy Mumy (Will), Jonathan Harris (Dr. Smith) and the robot reunite for a special tribute.
link.title: synopsis
Behind the Planet of the Apes
Return to the Bat Cave: The Misadventures of Adam and Burt
The Tomorrow Show with Tom Snyder: Punk & New Wave
The Munsters: America's First Family of Fright
The Secrets of Isis: Complete Series
Doctor Who: Battlefield: Feature Length Cut
Doctor Who: Remembrance of the Daleks
The Funny World of Lucy: Vol. 2
This is Coronation Street: The Anniversary Special
The Carol Burnett Show: Show Stoppers
The I Love Lucy 50th Anniversary Special

link.synopsis: Timmy (Justin Berfield) is a 12-year-old with more than his share of troubles: His father (Kevin Dobson) seems to have little time for him, his stepmother (Alana Stewart) keeps heaping on the chores and school isn't getting any easier. But life improves when a furry new friend -- a 500-pound gorilla -- follows Timmy to his house one day. Now, Timmy will do whatever it takes to keep his new pet in this outrageous family comedy.
link.title: synopsis
WWE: Jeff Hardy: My Life, My Rules
Francis the Talking Mule / Francis Goes to the Races
The Flintstones in Viva Rock Vegas
Sister Act 2: Back in the Habit
Mom and Dad Save the World
Three Men and a Little Lady

link.synopsis: To avoid being drafted for the Vietnam War, two young men pretend to be gay in this comedy about fear, stereotypes and acceptance. When Danny Devlin (Kevin Coughlin) and Elliot Crane (Lawrence P. Casey) move into an all-gay apartment building in an attempt to keep up their charade, Devlin soon finds himself in trouble with his fiancée. Will the boys be able to keep up the act long enough to avoid going to war?
link.title: synopsis
Surge of Power: The Stuff of Heroes
The Mostly Unfabulous Social Life of Ethan Green
I Now Pronounce You Chuck and Larry
Otto; or, Up With Dead People

link.synopsis: When Mona (Fairuza Balk) accidently kills her boyfriend (Patrick Dempsey), his ghost begins to follow her everywhere. Soon she realizes how much she loves him and does the only thing she can to live happily ever after with the love of ther life! Noah Taylor and Tea Leoni co-star in this dark comedy directed by Eleanor Gaver, which puts a new twist on the old adage of "undying love."
link.title: synopsis
Extreme Makeover Fitness: Weight Loss Workout for Beginners
The Beast that Killed Women/ The Monster of Camp Sunshine
Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas

link.synopsis: When the mysterious and sexy Ms. Xenobia (Judy Landers) takes over the biology class at the local college, the dating life of supergeek Wesley Littlejohn (Billy Jayne) takes a serious turn. Littlejohn agrees to be a lab rat for the professor's unusual vitamin research study. Now, thanks to some out-of-this-world supplements, he's been transformed into the campus stud. But Xenobia has ulterior extraterrestrial motives in this sci-fi sex comedy.
link.title: synopsis
Flesh Gordon Meets the Cosmic Cheerleaders
Rod Steele 0014: You Only Live Until You Die
The Sex Adventures of the Three Musketeers
Revenge of the Nerds III: The Next Generation
Big Shot: Confessions of a Campus Bookie

link.synopsis: Sonny and Cher, those icons of glitzy 1970s pop music, star as themselves in this musical comedy. When a top-dog movie producer tells the musical pair he wants to turn them into movie stars, Sonny fantasizes about possible plots for their debut film. Songs include "I Got You Babe," "It's the Little Things," "Good Times," "Trust Me," "Don't Talk To Strangers," "I'm Gonna Love You" and "Just a Name." Also stars George Sanders and Norman Alden.
link.title: synopsis
The Very Best of Cher: The Video Hits Collection
Saturday Night Live: 25 Years of Music
Vocal Group Hall of Fame: Vol. 4
Run Swinger Run / Sex Club International
The Work of Director Spike Jonze
A Hard Day's Night: Collector's Series
Walk Hard: The Dewey Cox Story

link.synopsis: A new AIDS hospice sends a tiny Southern town into a hysterical homophobic frenzy, and the locals start heeding rumors that the facility has tainted the town's water supply with something that "turns" people gay. Caught in the middle is harried wife Alex Stratton (Keri Jo Chapman), whose fling with high school pal Grace sets off more chain reactions in this indie comedy, a winner at the 1997 Philadelphia International Gay and Lesbian Festival.
link.title: synopsis
The Incredibly True Adventure of 2 Girls in Love
Midnight in the Garden of Good and Evil

link.synopsis: Oscar-winner Geoffrey Rush stars in this blend of horror and black comedy from Down Under. On the verge of discovering how to halt the aging process, Dr. Richard Shorkinghorn (David Wenham) finds his research stymied by a lack of funding. Desperate, he reluctantly joins his rival and ex-girlfriend (Frances O'Connor) for a weekend at the home of Finance Minster Godfrey Usher (Rush) and his wife (Heather Mitchell) -- who secretly worship Satan.
link.title: synopsis
South Park: Bigger, Longer and Uncut
Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels
National Lampoon Presents: The Beach Party at the Threshold of Hell
The Men Who Stare at Goats
Tales from the Crypt: Demon Knight

link.synopsis: Director John Allison serves up an inventive theatrical production of William Shakespeare's well-loved comedy. Desperate nobleman Baptista (Larry Drake) offers the hand of his lovely daughter Bianca (Kathryn Johnson) to anyone who can find a husband for her iron-willed sister, Kate (Karen Austin). Cocky Petruchio (Franklyn Seales) accepts the challenge, but taming the fiery Kate proves difficult in this delightful battle of the sexes.
link.title: synopsis
Shakespeare Comedies: The Taming of the Shrew
Shakespeare Comedies: As You Like It
Alcohol Can Be a Gas!: Fueling an Ethanol Revolution for the 21st Century
Hamlet by Brook / Brook by Brook
Monty Python's The Meaning of Life

link.synopsis: Diamond thief Raja Babu (Pran) pulls a heist and desperately needs to hide the loot. When he puts the jewels in the hip pocket of a young boy waiting for the train, he thinks he's found the perfect place. But that boy is actually Vijay (Kishore Kumar), an eccentric man hoping to get a child's discount ticket. Now, if Raja wants the loot, he must survive Vijay's goofy adventure. Kalidas directs this oddball comedy with music by Salil Chaudhury.
link.title: synopsis

link.synopsis: Chaos ensues after a bored kid begs the question "What do you guys wanna do?" in this roller-coaster ride of a comedy. It's a peaceful summer's day, and pals Bobby (Evan Gabriel), Johnnie (Shaun Poremba) and Chuck (Seth Fjersted) could use a little excitement. But the boys' attempt at entertaining themselves leads to suburban mayhem when they run into a swarming beehive, a possessed lawnmower, a suspicious junkman and the neighborhood bully.
link.title: synopsis
The Adventures of Elmo in Grouchland
Lady and the Tramp II: Scamp's Adventure
The Land Before Time X: The Great Longneck Migration
Pooh's Grand Adventure: The Search for Christopher Robin
Stuart Little 3: Call of the Wild

link.synopsis: Ace reporter Johnny Twennies (Gibson Frazier) is stuck in the 1920s -- and blissfully unaware that he's out of place in modern-day Manhattan -- in this rollicking indie comedy that gently pokes fun at black-and-white film classics. His girlfriend is fed up because he hasn't kissed her, his boss wants him canned, and the mob wants him rubbed out because he knows too much. Can Johnny get the scoop and the girl while staying alive?
link.title: synopsis
W.C. Fields Comedy Collection: It's a Gift
Tristram Shandy: A Cock and Bull Story
Stop the War Coalition: Benefit Concert
Cuentos De Hadas Para Dormir Cocodrilos

link.synopsis: A dreamy Parisian backdrop gives a romantic setting to this thoughtful comedy that follows the heartaches and loves of a group of city-dwellers. Costume designer Ada (Helena Bonham Carter) deals with the ups and downs of her relationship with an unstable screenwriter, Paul (Jean-Philippe Ecoffey), while Paul longs for Ada's co-worker Lise (Romane Bohringer). Elsa Zylberstein, Yvan Attal and Marie Trintignant co-star.
link.title: synopsis
Claude Chabrol: The Color of Lies

link.synopsis: In this quirky comedy, orphaned brothers Chris (Derek Martini) and Tony (Steven Martini) struggle with their dysfunctional love lives and dead-end existences. But when they get reacquainted with their cheery uncle Clive (Bill Henderson), the pair finds romance and friendship with mail carrier Kathy (Christa Miller) and immigrant Anna (Rosemarie Addeo). Kevin Jordan's directorial debut won the Discovery Award at the 1999 Toronto Film Festival.
link.title: synopsis
That's the Way I Like It

title.regular: Smiling Fish and Goat on Fire
title.short: Smiling Fish and Goat on Fire

link.synopsis: After becoming a widow, Michelle O'Brien (Leslie Caron) moves with her infant son to a Greenwich Village apartment, where bohemian upstairs neighbor Harley Rummell (Warren Beatty), who makes "art films," is immediately attracted to her. Michelle hopes to marry affluent child psychologist Peter Brock (Robert Cummings) -- who secretly loathes children -- but Harley has other plans in this frothy romantic comedy directed by Arthur Hiller.
link.title: synopsis
Boy, Did I Get a Wrong Number!
How to Stuff a Wild Bikini
A Guide for the Married Man
I Love You, Alice B. Toklas!
How to Save a Marriage and Ruin Your Life / Who Was That Lady?

link.synopsis: This colorful, outlandish musical comedy addresses the AIDS issue as no medium has before. A 170-year-old Victorian sexologist and explorer (John Robinson) is organizing an exhibition about Patient Zero (Normand Fateux), the flight attendant accused of bringing AIDS to Canada. Trouble is, Patient Zero is back in town and determined to stifle the display, which leads to a hilarious showdown filled with song, dance, puppets and even a water ballet.
link.title: synopsis
The Decline of the American Empire

link.synopsis: Nominated for an Academy Award, this dark comedy is the coming-of-age story of a rebellious girl raised in a repressive Norwegian village. Maria is terribly aware of her burgeoning sexuality and takes solace in long walks and secret readings of the racy text in the Old Testament. While out strolling, Maria encounters a woman who encourages her to test her sexual wings and savor life, but that's easier said than done for the reclusive girl.
link.title: synopsis
Cross My Heart and Hope to Die
It's Kind of a Funny Story

link.synopsis: From appliances to relationships, there's nothing Roger Crumpkin (Yahoo Serious) -- an ever-bumbling maintenance man at an egg factory -- can't dismantle. But after he falls for a quirky chicken-sexer named Sunday (Helen Dillmore), he's determined to prove his worth -- and he gets his chance when he uncovers a plot to make eggs more addictive. This quirky comedy was written, directed and produced by Serious himself.
link.title: synopsis
The Man Who Knew Too Little

link.synopsis: At lively nightspot Luminarias, four Latina singles gather weekly to swap stories about love, careers, race, family and their swiftly approaching 40th birthdays. Lawyer Andrea (Evelina Fernandez), therapist Sofia (Marta DuBois), clothing designer Irene (Dyana Ortelli) and painter Lilly (Angela Moya) help each other sniff out the spice of romance in Los Angeles' cultural melting pot in this sexy comedy costarring Scott Bakula and Cheech Marin.
link.title: synopsis
Glow Ropes: The Rise and Fall of a Bar Mitzvah Emcee
How the Garcia Girls Spent Their Summer

link.synopsis: Another birthday brings regrets of "the road not taken" for Pamela Drury (Rachel Griffiths), a successful but still-single journalist living alone in director Pip Karmel's charming fantasy comedy set in Sydney, Australia. After finding a photo of a man whose proposal she rejected 13 years earlier, Pamela suddenly gets a chance to trade places with her alternate reality counterpart and learns that soccer mom life isn't all it's cracked up to be.
link.title: synopsis
You Will Meet a Tall Dark Stranger
How to Kill Your Neighbor's Dog
Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind

link.synopsis: When Boris (Jason Alexander), Natasha (Rene Russo) and Fearless Leader (Robert De Niro) take over numerous television networks with the goal of hypnotizing American viewers, young FBI investigator Karen Sympathy (Piper Perabo) tries to stop them with the help of sharp-tongued Rocky and dim-witted Bullwinkle. John Goodman, Carl Reiner, Randy Quaid, David Alan Grier, Janeane Garofalo and Billy Crystal co-star in this mixed live action-animated comedy.
link.title: synopsis
Dr. Dolittle: Tail to the Chief
Who Framed Roger Rabbit?: Special Edition
Charlie Chan and the Curse of the Dragon Queen
Three Men and a Little Lady
The Flintstones in Viva Rock Vegas

title.regular: The Adventures of Rocky and Bullwinkle
title.short: The Adventures of Rocky and Bullwinkle

link.synopsis: While vacationing in a quiet resort town, three middle-aged friends (Rudolf Hrusinsky, Vlastimil Brodsky and Frantisek Rehak) are joined by a tightrope walker named Ernie the Conjurer (director Jiri Menzel) and his lovely young assistant, Anna (Jana Preissova). But the girl's presence has the unfortunate side effect of throwing everyone's life out of balance. This critically acclaimed Czech comedy is based on the novel by Vladislav Vancura.
link.title: synopsis
I Served the King of England
Good Soldier Schweik 2: Beg to Report, Sir
The Night of the Shooting Stars
The End of August at the Hotel Ozone
Valerie and Her Week of Wonders
Jan Svankmajer: The Ossuary and Other Tales
If It's Tuesday, This Must Be Belgium
Beach Blanket Bingo / How to Stuff a Wild Bikini

link.synopsis: Just when covert assassin Eddie Jones (Courtney B. Vance) decides to ditch his dangerous job to settle down with his girlfriend, his superiors convince him to kill a renegade drug cartel hit man -- leading to nothing but trouble. Complicating matters is Eddie's vow of celibacy and the fact that Lois is unaware of his murderous lifestyle. Jason Alexander, Ed Asner, Regina King and Kathleen Turner co-star in this screwball romantic comedy.
link.title: synopsis
A Good Man Is Hard to Find
Where's My Man, To-Nite? / Mystery in Swing
Wrestling Gold: Vol. 2: The Maim Event
He Say, She Say, But What Does God Say?

link.synopsis: A new captain takes over the Satellite of Love spaceship when the mad doctors launch Mike Nelson into orbit in this episode of the hit comedy sci-fi series. Join Nelson and his robot companions Crow and Tom Servo as they view this drive-in classic. The boys add their own commentary to this campy B movie, in which mad scientist Dr. Bill Cortner (Jason Evers) keeps his fiancée's severed head alive while he prowls the bars looking for a replacement body.
link.title: synopsis
Mystery Science Theater 3000: The Dead Talk Back
Mystery Science Theater 3000: Prince of Space
Mystery Science Theater 3000: The Crawling Hand
Mystery Science Theater 3000: Overdrawn at the Memory Bank
Mystery Science Theater 3000: Boggy Creek II: And the Legend Continues
Mystery Science Theater 3000: Merlin's Shop of Mystical Wonders
Mystery Science Theater 3000: Mr. B's Lost Shorts
Mystery Science Theater 3000: Manos: The Hands of Fate
Mystery Science Theater 3000: Parts: The Clonus Horror
Mystery Science Theater 3000: The Giant Spider Invasion
Mystery Science Theater 3000: Santa Claus Conquers the Martians
Mystery Science Theater 3000: The Killer Shrews
Mystery Science Theater 3000: Red Zone Cuba
Mystery Science Theater 3000: Hercules Against the Moon Men
Mystery Science Theater 3000: Manhunt in Space
Mystery Science Theater 3000: The Wild World of Batwoman
Mystery Science Theater 3000: The Giant Gila Monster
Mystery Science Theater 3000: Monster a Go-Go
Mystery Science Theater 3000: Attack of the Giant Leeches
Mystery Science Theater 3000: The Corpse Vanishes
Mystery Science Theater 3000: Warrior of the Lost World
Mystery Science Theater 3000: Teenagers from Outer Space
RiffTrax: Night of the Living Dead
Mystery Science Theater 3000: The Phantom Planet
Mystery Science Theater 3000: The Robot vs. The Aztec Mummy
Mystery Science Theater 3000: Blood Waters of Dr. Z
Mystery Science Theater 3000: I Accuse My Parents
Mystery Science Theater 3000: Ring of Terror
Mystery Science Theater 3000: The Crawling Eye
Mystery Science Theater 3000: Secret Agent, Super Dragon
Mystery Science Theater 3000: Night of the Blood Beast
Mystery Science Theater 3000: The Touch of Satan
Mystery Science Theater 3000: Horrors of Spider Island
Mystery Science Theater 3000: The Girl in Lovers' Lane
Mystery Science Theater 3000: The Indestructible Man
Mystery Science Theater 3000: The Final Sacrifice

title.regular: Mystery Science Theater 3000: The Brain That Wouldn't Die
title.short: MST3K: The Brain That Wouldn't Die

link.synopsis: Classified-ad clerk Oliver Pease (Burgess Meredith), short on cash, moonlights as a "man on the street" newspaper reporter. But the simple question he asks draws three entirely different answers from two laconic jazz musicians (Henry Fonda and Jimmy Stewart), a movie star (Dorothy Lamour) and an everyman at the end of his rope (Fred MacMurray). This episodic comedy costars Paulette Goddard and William Demarest.
link.title: synopsis
No Time for Love / The Egg and I
The Man on the Eiffel Tower
You Can't Take It with You
The Beautiful Blonde from Bashful Bend
The Ealing Comedy Collection: Whisky Galore

link.synopsis: crewball comedy hits the slopes in this story about dimwitted Willie Jones (Keith Coogan), who becomes a skiing superhero the second he slaps on his K2s. Speed-demon Willie decides to race against the pros on the notorious Kamikaze Run, an extreme course with a shining pot of gold ($500,000) at the end for the winner. Willie's competition includes a lecherous hunk, a grousing mama's boy and a tosspot ex-Olympian, all intent on victory.
link.title: synopsis

link.synopsis: With the help of a rich philanthropist, a poor student named Raja (Kunal) is able to attend college, where he meets Roja (Sonali Bendre) over the Internet and quickly falls in love. The only problem is that neither person is who he or she claims to be, and when Raja learns his new love is actually the daughter of his rich benefactor, their affair could be doomed. This romantic comedy from director Kathir features music from A.R. Rehman.
link.title: synopsis
Love Ke Liye Kuch Bhi Karega
Kal Ho Naa Ho: Tomorrow May Never Come

link.synopsis: Ashok (Shammi Kapoor) is an immoral gossip columnist who will drag anyone through the mud if it makes for a juicy story. But when he publishes a photo of a young woman (Saira Banu) slapping a man on the street, he finds he's in over his head -- because the subject is his boss's daughter. Now it will take a little creativity for Ashok to save face -- and his job. This screwball comedy features music by acclaimed musical duo Kalyanji and Anandji.
link.title: synopsis
Jis Desh Men Ganga Behti Hai

link.synopsis: In Ape Man, Bela Lugosi stars as a scientist who turns into a hairy beast. In his next film, Lugosi plays the butler of a man threatened by a killer called the Gorilla. And as a witch doctor in White Zombie, he turns a woman into a mindless zombie. The Gorilla, which is based on a 1920s stage comedy, stands out in Lugosi's filmography in that he assays a rare straight role and not the villain.
link.title: synopsis
Bela Lugosi Meets a Brooklyn Gorilla
The Adventures of Ma & Pa Kettle: Vol. 1
The Adventures of Buckaroo Banzai Across the 8th Dimension
Mystery Science Theater 3000: The Corpse Vanishes

title.regular: Ape Man / The Gorilla / White Zombie
title.short: Ape Man / The Gorilla / White Zombie

link.synopsis: Over four decades, Zagreb Film of Yugoslavia produced 600 animated films, winning more than 400 international awards and cultivating artistic filmmakers who designed their own works from start to finish. This two-part video includes 20 cartoons, beginning with a comedy section and wrapping up with a section for younger viewers. Each section includes three cartoons starring Zlatko Grgic's beloved animated feline Maxicat.
link.title: synopsis
Spike & Mike's Classic Festival of Animation
The Temptations: Get Ready: Definitive Performances 1965-1972
The Best of Zagreb Film: Be Careful / The Classic Collection
National Lampoon Presents Jake's Booty Call
Aqua Teen Hunger Force Colon Movie Film for Theaters
Liquid Tales: The Animated Films of Patrick Smith
Extreme Animation: Films by Phil Mulloy
Seth MacFarlane's Cavalcade of Cartoon Comedy: Uncensored
Jan Svankmajer: The Ossuary and Other Tales

title.regular: The Best of Zagreb Film: Laugh at Your Own Risk & For Children Only

link.synopsis: Abruptly killed in a car accident, minor-league sinner Max Devlin (Elliot Gould) finds himself in hell. Not content to spend eternity amid fire and brimstone, he strikes a deal with the devil's assistant, Barney Satin (Bill Cosby): If Max can convince three innocents to sell their souls, he gets to stay on earth. Complications arise, of course, in this devilishly funny comedy!
link.title: synopsis
Sgt. Bilko: The Phil Silvers Show: Season 1
WWE: The History of the Intercontinental Championship
Harry and Walter Go to New York
Journey to the Center of the Earth
Who Framed Roger Rabbit?: Special Edition

link.synopsis: Rude, lewd stand-up comedian Andrew Dice Clay does it again in this no-holds-barred comedy routine from 1993, offering uncensored opinions on everything from world politics to the differences between his crudeness and that of other celebrities. Take, for instance, such examples as Madonna with her controversial book Sex and Woody Allen with his complicated family life. No Dice Man performance is complete without his adult nursery rhymes.
link.title: synopsis
Andrew Dice Clay: One Night with Dice
George Carlin: You are All Diseased
Jamie Foxx Unleashed: Lost, Stolen and Leaked!
The Original Latin Kings of Comedy
Jamie Foxx: I Might Need Security
George Carlin: What Am I Doing in New Jersey?
I'm the One That I Want
George Carlin: Playing with Your Head
Blue Collar Comedy Tour: The Movie
Ron White: They Call Me "Tater Salad"
Karen Williams: I Need a Snack
Platinum Comedy Series: The Torry Brothers: A Family Affair
Jamie Foxx Presents: America's Funniest Comics: Vol. 3
Charlie Murphy: I Will Not Apologize

link.synopsis: This madcap comedy takes place in 1972, during one 24-hour period on Los Angeles's famed Sunset Strip -- where the lives of a group of young artists, musicians and entertainers are about to change forever. Directed by Adam Collis, the movie stars Adam Goldberg, Anna Friel, Darren E. Burrows, Jared Leto, John Randolph, Nick Stahl, Rory Cochrane, Simon Baker, Stephanie Romanov and Tommy Flanagan.
link.title: synopsis
The Private Life of Sherlock Holmes
Tenacious D in: The Pick of Destiny
Walk Hard: The Dewey Cox Story
The Night of the White Pants
The Other Side of the Bed
Jay and Silent Bob Strike Back
An Alan Smithee Film: Burn Hollywood Burn

link.synopsis: Von Housen (Bela Lugosi) is a vampire with a nefarious plot to take over the world with the help of an evil robot. Unfortunately for him, the robot was accidentally shipped to the bumbling scullery maid, Mother Riley (Arthur Lucan). When the robot returns to Housen with Riley in tow, the blood sucker's troubles really begin. This classic slapstick comedy from John Gilling is the last film in Britain's hilarious "Mother Riley" series.
link.title: synopsis
The Return of Dracula / The Vampire
The Hammer Horror Series: The Kiss of the Vampire / Nightmare
You'll Find Out / Zombies on Broadway
The Whip and the Body / Conspiracy of Torture
Before I Hang / The Boogie Man Will Get You
Bela Lugosi Meets a Brooklyn Gorilla
The Ealing Comedy Collection: Whisky Galore
The Wrong Arm of the Law

link.synopsis: Barry (Christopher Meloni) is a bitter, sexist thirtysomething stand-up comic with a penchant for aggravating the wrong people. When his act provokes a knuckle sandwich one night, the sensible, idealistic and much younger Thea (Janel Moloney) picks him up. Although the two have nothing in common, that doesn't stop them from falling in love. Romance is rough, however, when opposites attract in this thoughtful romantic comedy.
link.title: synopsis
Romy and Michele's High School Reunion

link.synopsis: Con men Raja (Govinda) and Kanhaiya (Johnny Lever) are welcomed into the home of the wealthy Pitamber (Kader Khan) and his four obstinate daughters. Raja has even gotten one of the daughters to fall in love with him. Desperate, Pitamber offers Raja his daughter and his vast wealth if he can find suitors for his other spoiled daughters. That's easier said than done in this comedy from Shakeel Noorani that also stars Twinkle Khanna and Ali Asghar.
link.title: synopsis
Kal Ho Naa Ho: Tomorrow May Never Come
Love Ke Liye Kuch Bhi Karega

link.synopsis: Sent to a French auto show to steal the prototype of a futuristic new car, professional auto thief Luke Delson (David Arquette) runs into a challenge he didn't expect -- competition from beautiful fellow thief Claudia Haggs (Famke Janssen), who's also trying to jack the vehicle. The two will stop at nothing to outdrive, outsmart and out-trick each other in a bid to get the supercar. Ian Sharp directs this action comedy co-starring Emmanuelle Seigner.
link.title: synopsis
Strike Commando / Mannigan's Force / Death Raiders / Operation Nam
Hog Heaven: The Story of the Harley-Davidson Empire
From Dusk Till Dawn 2: Texas Blood Money
The Fast and the Furious: Tokyo Drift

link.synopsis: Film historian Leonard Maltin hosts eight of the original, early-sound Our Gang comedy shorts (which were renamed "The Little Rascals" when they hit television). Episodes include "Fly My Kite," "Honkey Donkey," "Beginners' Luck," "Reunion in Rhythm," "Hook and Ladder," "The First Round-up," "Teacher's Beau" and "Hearts are Thumps."
link.title: synopsis
The Little Rascals: The Best of Our Gang
The Adventures of Ma & Pa Kettle: Vol. 1
Abbott & Costello: Police Rookies / A Tale of Two Kitties / Mail Call / Abbott & Costello at the Movies
The Three Stooges: Nutty but Nice
Prehistoric Park: The Complete Television Event
Three Men and a Little Lady
Revenge of the Nerds IV: Nerds in Love

link.synopsis: Marital fidelity takes a beating in director Ernst Lubitsch's stylish sex comedy. Artful schemes abound as discontented housewife Mizzi Stock (Marie Prevost) sets her sights on Dr. Franz Braun (Monte Blue) -- the hubby of her blissfully wed best friend, Charlotte (Florence Vidor). Meanwhile, Mizzi's mate (Adolphe Menjou), who's itching for a divorce, hires a private investigator to get the goods on his irredeemably coquettish wife.
link.title: synopsis
The Oyster Princess / I Don't Want to Be a Man
Outskirts / The Girl with the Hatbox
Unseen Cinema: Early American Avant-Garde Film 1894-1941
Why Change Your Wife? / Miss Lulu Bett

link.synopsis: Halas and Batchelor was the largest and most influential animation studio in Britain for more than 50 years. Starting in 1940, it cranked out more than 2,000 films -- everything from comedy shorts to documentaries -- and is best known for its 1955 version of George Orwell's Animal Farm. Ranging from traditional to computer-generated animation, the seven films in the collection include The Magic Canvas, The Figurehead, Dilemma and others.
link.title: synopsis

link.synopsis: In this rousing musical comedy, Russ Tamblyn plays the diminutive Tom, who finds a home with a kindly woodcutter and his wife, only to find himself at the mercy of two conniving shysters, Tony (Peter Sellers) and Ivan (Terry-Thomas). An "excellent children's picture," says Leonard Maltin of this Academy Award-winning (for special effects) retelling of the classic Grimm fairy tale.
link.title: synopsis

link.synopsis: Woody Allen plays a kosher butcher (wearing cowboy boots and a Stetson, no less) who slices and dices his philandering wife (Sharon Stone) but loses track of her hand -- which becomes venerated in a small-town church for its ability to work miracles. An all-star cast including David Schwimmer, Elliott Gould, Kiefer Sutherland and Maria Grazia Cucinotta provides plenty of laughs in this dark comedy.
link.title: synopsis
A Film with Me in It

link.synopsis: To promote their bandleader buddy, Jimmy Haskel (James Stewart) and his sweetheart, Molly McCorkle (Paulette Goddard), devise a can't-miss gimmick to keep radio listeners tuned in. James Roosevelt, son of Franklin D. Roosevelt, produced this tuneful 1941 comedy, which is based on a cash-giveaway radio show. Horace Heidt and His Musical Knights are featured in several numbers, including a lavish showstopper at a country club.
link.title: synopsis
Juke Joint / Reet, Petite and Gone
Seven Sinners / The Shepherd of the Hills

link.synopsis: Raju (Govinda) and Urmila (Urmila Matondkar) fall in love while studying in New Zealand in this romantic comedy from director David Dhawan. When Raju must return to India, the lovers promise to reunite soon. On his way home, however, Raju meets Sharmila (Nagma), a pregnant woman who's been jilted by her boyfriend. Soon, he's agreed to pose as Sharmila's husband for her family. All goes smoothly until Urmila -- Sharmila's sister! -- shows up.
link.title: synopsis
Kyo Kii... Main Jhuth Nahin Bolta

link.synopsis: Undertaker Mort (Ray Dannis) and his two restaurateur pals fatten their respective practices by killing a slew of locals, burying them in Mort's fine coffins and then serving them for dinner at the buddies' restaurant. The plan works until some local detectives smell something rotten in the situation. The comedy is served black in this 1960s British macabre treat, which mixes over-the-top gore with tongue-in-cheek laughs.
link.title: synopsis
Matango: Attack of the Mushroom People
A Guide for the Married Man
The Sins of Showbiz: Baby Cat / The Mad Mad Moviemakers
Doctor of Doom / The Wrestling Women vs. The Aztec Mummy: Double Feature
Trinity Goes East / Trinity and Bambino
Who's That Knocking at My Door?

link.synopsis: A young couple takes a hard look at why their relationship is on the rocks in this romantic comedy. On the verge of breaking up, Kim (Tamara Lynch) and James (Damon Hines) make a last-ditch effort to save their union, agreeing to participate in a research project exploring the reasons that some couples make it while others don't. But as Kim and James analyze their relationship, they start to think they were right for each other all along.
link.title: synopsis
Tupac Shakur: The Complete Live Performances
Three Men and a Little Lady

link.synopsis: A case of mistaken identity leads to true love in this romantic comedy starring Salman Khan, Preity Zinta and Rani Mukherjee. The life of struggling singer Raj (Khan) gets turned upside down after the wealthy family of comatose patient Pooja (Mukherjee) takes Raj for her husband. Then Raj meets Pooja's best friend, Jahnvi (Zinta) -- and falls in love. But the jig is up when Pooja awakens from her coma and Raj must choose between the two women.
link.title: synopsis

link.synopsis: An awkward teen uses his science know-how to become a big man on campus in this dark comedy. Tired of being an outcast, brainy Frank Stein (Matthew Lawrence) reaches his limit when school bullies accidentally kill Karl O'Reilly (Ryan Reynolds) in a fracas. Frank resurrects Karl but unwittingly transplants a mass murderer's gray matter into his cranium. Everyone is impressed -- even Frank's dream girl (Christine Lakin) -- until Karl goes berserk.
link.title: synopsis

link.synopsis: This comedy about the second coming of Christ and the start of the apocalypse finds Christ (Martin Donovan) arriving in New York City on Dec. 31, 1999, pondering whether to fulfill his mission: break the Seven Seals on his laptop and trigger Armageddon. The universe's fate lies in the hands of the indecisive Christ as he mopes through the city streets. Hal Hartley directed this installment of the French "Collection 2000 Seen By" TV film series.
link.title: synopsis
Possible Films: Short Works by Hal Hartley 1994-2004
South Park: Bigger, Longer and Uncut

title.regular: The Book of Life: 2000 Seen By...
title.short: The Book of Life: 2000 Seen By...

link.synopsis: A charming romantic comedy with winning performances by a talented cast. Young professionals Christopher and Melissa meet and fall hard for each other. As their attraction grows, it becomes apparent that in order for their relationship to succeed, they must overcome Christopher's dark secret involving his father with the help of his best friend and a gruff psychiatrist.
link.title: synopsis
A Film with Me in It

link.synopsis: In this romantic comedy, lanky tour guide Harvey (Gregoire Colin) is told by a stranger that he strongly resembles legendary 1960s French new wave filmmaker Gascogne; before long, he's assumed to be Gascogne's son. Harvey quickly becomes the toast of Paris, hobnobbing with directors and Gascogne groupies. But his newfound "fame" may derail his relationship with Dinara (Dinara Droukarova), the film-buff interpreter on the tour.
link.title: synopsis
Claude Chabrol: The Color of Lies
The Romance of Astrea and Celadon
Music for the Movies: Bernard Herrmann
